participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and cheerful, Emily loves socializing and enjoys making others laugh. She's passionate about education and nurturing young minds.
participant_1.background: my favorite singer is taylor swift. i'm getting married in the spring. i am 24 years old. i love eating out with friends. i work at a school as a kindergarten teacher.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Laid-back and friendly, Jake enjoys the simple pleasures in life and is often found outdoors. He has a creative side, often indulging in coloring and drawing.
participant_2.background: i like to watch nhl hockey. i live is a rural farming community. i enjoy coloring books. i have a german shepherd dog.
